name: SpeedVitals RUM
tagline: Monitor real-user performance & web analytics
description: SpeedVitals RUM helps you monitor Real-User Performance (Core Web Vitals) and Web Analytics. Unlike Google Analytics, it is a privacy-first alternative that doesn't use cookies.

name: Eleven Music
tagline: The highest quality AI music model
description: Generate original, royalty-free songs with our AI music generator. Turn simple text prompts into custom music in seconds. Free song maker for musicians, producers, and content creators.

name: Bifrost
tagline: The fastest LLM gateway in the market
description: Bifrost is the fastest, open-source LLM gateway with built-in MCP support, dynamic plugin architecture, and integrated governance. With a clean UI, Bifrost is 40x faster than LiteLLM, and plugs in with Maxim for e2e evals and observability of your AI products.

name: OpenAI Open Models
tagline: gpt-oss-120b and gpt-oss-20b open-weight language models
description: Apache 2.0 licensed open-weight models designed for powerful reasoning, agentic tasks, and versatile developer use cases.

name: Sequoia Health 2.0
tagline: Personalized men's sexual health with on-demand experts
description: Get a personalized plan, track progress, consult doctors, read expert content, and stay on top of checkupsâ€”all in one app. Built for men who want to feel stronger, think clearer, and live betterâ€”and for partners who want to support them. Free to start

name: Genie 3
tagline: A new frontier for world models
description: Genie 3 by Google DeepMind is a new world model that generates diverse, interactive environments from a text prompt. You can navigate these worlds in real-time at 720p, with a high degree of consistency and naturalness.

name: Shipper.now
tagline: Build full-stack apps by talking to AI
description: This is a fullstack app builder, designed with the everybody in mind. No matter if you're technical or not, with Shipper you can build full products from the first prompt. Shipper creates a live business, not just a codebase.

name: Coverage Cat
tagline: Your AI-native insurance broker
description: Coverage Cat, the AI insurance agent, answers questions about home, auto, umbrella, life, and disability insurance. It will help you figure out if you should buy that policy, file that claim, and help you shop around for a better price.

name: Source Public Beta
tagline: Built for B2B marketers. AI-powered attribution made simple
description: Source is an AI-powered marketing attribution platform. See which channels, content, and keywords actually drive customers â€” not just clicks. Now in public beta. ðŸŽ First 100 users get free 1:1 strategy consulting. Sign up here -> https://www.source.app/

name: Equip AI Interview
tagline: Ask any question. Natural language response. Instant results
description: Automate candidate screening. Create a quiz and set evaluation prompts for each question. Equip AI will evaluate candidates' text, audio or video responses and rank them. Effective for recruiters. Convenient for candidates.

name: Leadchee
tagline: Smarter CRM for startups
description: Leadchee is a CRM built for startups, designed to make managing leads effortless. Unlike bloated enterprise tools, Leadchee integrates seamlessly into your workflow, automating follow-ups, prioritizing leads, and giving you real-time insights.

name: Agent Maya (by Flow AI)
tagline: Turn LinkedIn messages into sales calls
description: Prospecting is harder than ever for founders and sales teams. Agent Maya is an AI coâ€‘pilot that starts LinkedIn conversations and guides them to sales calls. She follows a proven playbook, suggests perfect replies, and keeps leads organized with a simple CRM.

name: IMGPT
tagline: AI Ads that don't feel AI generated
description: Go from a single link to stunning creatives in minutes. Create, edit, resize, publish, and test your ads in one place.

name: SiteAssist
tagline: Build AI Assistants trained only on your own data
description: SiteAssist adds a fully brand-able AI assistant to any pageâ€”product, docs, dashboards. A lightning crawler indexes your entire site & files in minutes. Free hobby tier; live in 5 min.

name: SuperPrompt 2.0
tagline: Save & paste your AI prompts without switching tabs
description: Tired of rewriting the same AI prompts or digging through old docs to find them? SuperPrompt is a simple Chrome sidebar that saves your favorite prompts and lets you paste them instantly into any chatbot so you can work faster & Smarter.

name: AutoSortPro
tagline: Messy files â†’ renamed, searchable, and .md export-ready
description: AutoSortPro instantly renames, tags, and organizes your screenshots and files into a searchable knowledge base â€” no manual sorting. Export clean markdown to Obsidian, Notion, Roam, or wherever you keep your notes.

name: Text2Query
tagline: Turn plain language into powerful database queries
description: Turn natural language into SQL and MongoDB queries. Upload your schema, ask questions, and get results with clear explanations â€” no coding needed. Runs fully in your browser. Private, multilingual, beginner-friendly. Supports multiple databases.

name: Pinto
tagline: A free stylized terminal for macOS
description: A Terminal wrapper for macOS. Contribute to nuance-dev/Pinto development by creating an account on GitHub.

name: JEO
tagline: Create cinematic AI videos in seconds
description: Create cinematic AI videos in seconds with Veo 3, Kling & Hailuo â€” all in one app. Text-to-video, image animation, and HD export. Free trial for early adopters â€” try now and share your feedback!

name: GitPeeks
tagline: Instant previews for your code changes
description: Automate your preview environments for faster collaboration. With GitPeeks, developers, designers, and teams can share real-time feedback on every change effortlessly. Get started today â€” managed or self-hosted.
